source:
（とうとう討論会の収録だ。生放送だし、さすがの
真美も緊張しているかもしれないな……）
translatedstr:
(At last, a recording of the debate...it's live and as expected...)
(Mami might be nervous too. ......)

source:
兄ちゃん……あのさ……真美……
ずっと、考えてたんだけど……
translatedstr:
Brother ...... thats it...... mami......
I've been thinking about this for a long time: ......

source:
どうした真美、そんな真剣な顔をして。
悩みごとか？
translatedstr:
What's wrong Mami, you look so serious.
Troublesome?

source:
うん……。あのさ、本番前に食べるお菓子、
プリンとゼリーどっちがいいかな！？
translatedstr:
Yeah ....... You know, snacks to eat before the show,
I'd rather have pudding or jelly!

source: ……プリンと、ゼリー……？
translatedstr: ...... pudding and ...... jelly?

source:
そう！　始まる前のゴホービと、終わった後の
ゴホービ、どっちをどっちにするか考えてたら……
translatedstr:
Yes! Ghoobi before it starts and after it's over.
Ghobi, if you're trying to figure out which is which: ......

source:
９時間しか寝れなかったよー！　お肌が荒れちゃう！
クマー！　クマー！　クマが襲ってくるー！
translatedstr:
I only slept for 9 hours!
Kumar! Kumar! Kumar is attacking me!

source:
クマは全然出てないぞ、よく眠れたみたいだな。
とにかく、どっちか早く食べてきたらどうだ？
translatedstr:
No bears at all, looks like you slept well.
Anyway, why don't you go eat one of them sooner?

source:
だからプリンとゼリー、どっちかなんて、
決めらんないよー！　どっちも食べたいもん！
translatedstr:
So it's either pudding or jelly,
I can't decide! I want to eat both!

source: アイスをあきらめるのだって大変だったのに……！
translatedstr: Even giving up ice cream was hard. ......

source:
これ以上真美を苦しめるなんて……。
兄ちゃん、さてはドエス？　ってやつだね
translatedstr:
I can't believe I'm making Mami suffer any more. ......
Brother, are you a douchebag?

source:
誤解されるような発言はやめなさい！
わかった、じゃあ……
translatedstr:
Don't make misleading statements!
Okay, then ......

source: どっちも食べる
translatedstr: eat both

source: どっちも食べない
translatedstr: I don't eat either.

source: どっちも食べるんだ！　２つとも食べて頑張れ！
translatedstr: Eat them both! Eat them both and go for it!

source:
どっちも！？　そしたら終わった後のゴホービが
なくなっちゃうよ！　真美、がんばれな～い！
translatedstr:
Both of them! Then Ghoobi afterwards.
I'm going to run out! Mami, I can't keep up!

source:
せくしーが足りなくなっちゃうよー！
シシュンキの終わりだよー！
translatedstr:
I'm going to run out of Sekushi!
It's the end of the shishunki!

source:
収録が終わったら俺がアイスを買ってあげるから、
どっちも食べて元気な真美で収録に行ってこい！
translatedstr:
I'll buy you ice cream when the recording is over,
Eat both and go to the recording with a healthy Mami!

source:
え、やったー♪　兄ちゃんならそう言ってくれるって
信じてたよー！　んっふっふ～、作戦セイコー☆
translatedstr:
Oh, yay... my brother would say so.
I believed you!

source:
真美、超がんばってくるから、コンビニで
いっちばんたかーいアイス、よろしくねー♪
translatedstr:
Mami, I'm going to work super hard at the convenience store.
The best ice cream ever!

source:
やっぱりそういう作戦だったか……！
わかったから行ってこい。頑張れよ！
translatedstr:
I knew that was the plan. ......
All right, go ahead, good luck!

source:
アイアイサー！　まっかせてー☆
アイスアイスアーイス～♪
translatedstr: I'll see you soon!

source:
（収録が始まったが……元気で明るく真美なりに
的確な意見を言っている。これは大成功だな！）
translatedstr:
(The recording began, but ...... was cheerful and bright, in Mami's own way.
You're right on the money...this is a huge success!)

source:
どっちも食べないで、２つとも終わったあとの
ご褒美に回せばいいじゃないか
translatedstr:
Don't eat either one, after you're done with both of them.
Why don't you just turn it into a reward?

source:
どっちも食べるな……？　そんなゴーモンを平気で
できるなんて兄ちゃんはドエス？　どころじゃない！
translatedstr:
Don't eat either of them. ......? I'm not afraid of such gormons.
I can't believe you can do it!

source:
鬼だー！　鬼はーソト！　アイスはーウチ！
兄ちゃんの鬼ー！　桃太郎さーん、出番ですよ！
translatedstr:
The devil is in Soto, and the ice cream is in my house!
Brother ogre! Momotaro-san, you're up!

source:
出番なのは真美のほうだぞ、もうすぐ本番だ。
だからそろそろ準備を……
translatedstr:
It's Mami's turn to go on the air, and she's about to go on the air.
So it's time to get ready: ......

source:
兄ちゃんなんて知らないもん！
シシュンキの角にぶつけて、転んじゃえー！
translatedstr:
I don't know my brother!
Hit the corner of the shishunki and fall down!

source: どういう状況なんだそれは……
translatedstr: What's the situation with that? ......

source:
（収録が始まったが……元気がないし発言もいまいち
だな。プリンとゼリーを食べさせるべきだった……）
translatedstr:
(The recording has begun, but ...... is not very energetic and not very good at speaking up.
Yes, I should have fed her pudding and Jell-O (......)

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)

source:
ん？　あの後ろ姿は真美か？
おーい！
translatedstr:
Hm? Is that Mami in the back?
Hey!

source: あっ！　兄ちゃん、おっはよんよーん♪
translatedstr: Oh! Hey, brother, good morning!

source:
ああ、おはよう。
ルミナスでも真美らしさは変わらないな！
translatedstr:
Oh, good morning.
Even the luminous doesn't change the mami-ness!

source:
んっふっふ～。まさにツワモノ大集合って感じ？
新しいトモダチが増えたみたいでウキウキするよね♪
translatedstr:
It's just like a big collection of lucky ones, isn't it?
It's exciting to have a new friend.

source: それは良かった、ルミナスを頼むぞ
translatedstr: That's good to know. Luminous, please.

source:
うんうん、真美にズババーンとおっまかせ～！
ガンバっちゃうよ～ん♪
translatedstr:
Mami will take care of it!
I'll do my best!

source:
よし、その意気だ。
今日も元気にいこうか
translatedstr:
Okay, that's the spirit.
Let's be in good spirits today!

source:
デデーン！　プロデューサーが、あらわれた。
真美は『逃げ出した』！　ズダダダダッ！！
translatedstr:
Dedane! The producer showed up.
Mami 'ran away'!

source:
えっ？　……おい、真美！？
どこ行くんだ、そっちは事務所じゃないぞ！
translatedstr:
What? ...... Hey, Mami!
Where are you going? That's not the office!

source:
もう兄ちゃん、ノリが悪いな～！
真美がせっかく遊んであげようとしてるのに
translatedstr:
You're not in a groove anymore, brother!
Mami is trying so hard to play with you.

source:
そうか、ところで真美、確かそこのコンビニに
新作のアイスが並んでたような……
translatedstr:
Oh, by the way, Mami, I think there's a convenience store there.
Like the new ice cream line ......

source:
えーっ！　新作発売してたの！？
食べたい食べたい食べたーい！
translatedstr:
Wow! You've released a new one!
I want to eat, I want to eat, I want to eat!

source:
わ、分かった。買いに行こう。
真美も一緒に来るか？
translatedstr:
Okay, okay, let's go buy it.
Mami, do you want to come with me?

source:
行く行く！　ねえ兄ちゃん、アイス、
真美の分はモチ、亜美の分も買ってちょ☆
translatedstr:
I'm going, I'm going, I'm going! Hey brother, ice cream,
Buy one for Mami and one for Ami, too!

source:
了解。そうだな……、
せっかくだからみんなの分も買おう
translatedstr:
Roger that. yes. ......,
Since we're at it, let's buy one for everyone.

source: 兄ちゃん、本日もプロデュース、ゴクロウじゃ～！
translatedstr: Brother, today's produce, Gokuro-jya!

source:
あれ、真美？　まだ帰ってなかったのか。
……ああ、また杏たちとゲームでもしてたんだな？
translatedstr:
Oh, Mami? You didn't go home yet?
...... Oh, you've been playing games with the Anzu again, haven't you?

source:
んー、それもあるけど……ありがとね、兄ちゃん！
こんな面白いプロジェクトに、真美を入れてくれて☆
translatedstr:
Hmmm, that's part of it, but thanks for the ......, brother!
Thank you for including Mami in such an interesting project.

source: えっ？　急にどうしたんだ？
translatedstr: What? What happened all of a sudden?

source:
真美が楽しいのは、兄ちゃんのおかげだし。
だから、今回はトクベツにほめてつかわす！
translatedstr:
Mami is having fun because of you, brother.
So, this time, I'll give her a compliment!

source:
はは、ほめてつかわしてくれるのか。
ありがとう、真美が楽しめてるなら何よりだよ
translatedstr:
Haha, they give you compliments?
Thanks, I'm glad you're enjoying yourself Mami.

source:
真美も、兄ちゃんと一緒にガンバっていくかんね！
というわけで～……これからもよろよろ～♪
translatedstr:
Mami and her brother will work hard together!
So ~...... keep up the good work~♪

source:
兄ちゃん。オハオハロー♪
今日もアゲアゲでいくかんね～
translatedstr:
Oh, brother.
I'm going to be on a roll today, too!

source:
もしかしなくても、兄ちゃん！　おっはよー！
朝から真美に会えるなんて、チョーラッキーだね♪
translatedstr:
If you don't mind me saying so, brother!
I'm so lucky to be able to see Mami in the morning.

source:
兄ちゃん、お疲れサマ～！　なんかコンビニで
お菓子を買って帰りたい気分だね！　ちらっ
translatedstr:
Hey bro, good job! I was at some convenience store.
I'm in the mood to buy some candy to take home!

source:
兄ちゃん、オツオツ～♪　真美は亜美とふたりで、
めくるめくディナーにいってくるよ～ん！
translatedstr:
Mami and Ami are together,
I'm off to a dazzling dinner!

source:
真美、今日の収録は、ファン参加型番組の
『びっくり世界新記録』だ
translatedstr:
Mami, today's recording is for a fan participation program.
It's a new world record.

source:
アイアイサー！　ファンのみんなと協力して、
なんか世界新記録を出せばいいんだよね？
translatedstr:
IISER! Work with all the fans,
We should set some kind of new world record, right?

source:
ああ、新記録が出せなくても、
ファンとの交流ができる悪くない仕事だな
translatedstr:
Yeah, even if we can't set a new record,
Not a bad job to interact with the fans.

source:
真美にかかれば朝飯前のコンチキチン！
バシっと決めて世界デビュー狙っちゃうよーん！
translatedstr:
Mami's "Konchikichin" is a breakfast for Mami!
I'm going to make a bold decision and aim for a world debut!

source:
簡単に言うけど、挑戦する競技は
直前までわからないのがな……
translatedstr:
Simply put, the challenging competitions are
You don't know until the last minute. ......

source:
兄ちゃん、心配しすぎっしょ♪
まあ、お茶漬けでも食べたキモチで見ていたまえ！
translatedstr:
Brother, you worry too much.
Well, watch it with the feeling of having eaten ochazuke (rice with green tea)!

source:
さあ、真美ちゃんがファンと一緒に挑戦するのは、
『キズナでつなげ！　しりとりリレー！』だっ！
translatedstr:
Now, Mami will take on the challenge with her fans,
It's called "Kizuna de Tsunade! Shiritori Relay!

source:
ええええ！　リレー！？　真美、誰が
何を言ったかなんて、覚えてらんないよ！
translatedstr:
Yeah, yeah, yeah! Relay! Mami, who is it?
I can't remember what I said!

source:
しりとりって、他の人の言ったことと
かぶったらダメなんでしょーーー！？
translatedstr:
Shiritori is what other people said.
You're not supposed to wear it!

source:
どうしよう、兄ちゃん！　このままじゃ真美の
キオクがピンチ！　セケンテイがキケンイキだよ！
translatedstr:
What should I do, brother! If I don't do this, Mami's
Kioku is in trouble! Sekentei is kiken-iki!

source:
まずは落ち着け！
とりあえず、しりとりリレーは……
translatedstr:
First of all, calm down!
In the meantime, the Shiritori Relay can be found at ......

source: 五十音順にメモする
translatedstr: Note in alphabetical order

source: とにかくメモする
translatedstr: I'll write it down anyway.

source: 記憶する
translatedstr: Memorize

source: 勢いにまかせる
translatedstr: give way to momentum

source:
一度言われた単語はメモしながら進めよう。
五十音順にメモすれば、探す手間も省けるぞ
translatedstr:
Once a word is said, write it down as you go along.
If you write them down in alphabetical order, it will save you the trouble of having to search for them!

source:
ナイスアイディア！　って、メモっていいんだ！？
よーし、五十音順だね！　真美ガンバってみるよ！
translatedstr:
Nice idea, and you can write it down!
Okay, in alphabetical order! I'll try to do my best, Mami!

source:
次は『あ』か！　あ、あー……あっ！
『アルトリコーダー』！
translatedstr:
Next up is "A"! Ah, ah, ah, ...... ah!
The Altricorder!

source:
（真美のメモの取り方が良かったのか、しりとりは
順調につながっていき、記録を更新した！）
translatedstr:
(Mami's note-taking was good or shirit.
(They connected so well, they set a record!)

source: （番組は大成功で、真美の対応力も高評価だった！）
translatedstr: (The program was a huge success and Mami's ability to handle it was highly appreciated!)

source:
一度言われた単語は、メモをするのはどうだ？
そうすれば、同じ単語を言わずにすむはずだ
translatedstr:
How about once the word is said, make a note of it?
That way we wouldn't have to say the same words.

source:
真美のキオクのメモリー……ってメモっていいの？
それなら真美でもガンバれるかも！？
translatedstr:
Can I write down the memory ...... of Mami's kioku?
Then even Mami might be able to hang on!

source:
次は『わ』？　ちょいマッチング……。
えっと、えーっと……『脇腹』！
translatedstr:
What's next, "Wa"? A little matching: .......
Let's see, let's see... ...... "Flank"!

source:
（真美は時々つっかえながらも、メモの力を借りて、
しりとりを繋げることができた！）
translatedstr:
(Mami stumbles from time to time, but with the help of her notes,
(I could connect the shirit!)

source:
（記録更新とは至らなかったが、真美の言葉の
選び方も合わせて、番組は話題になった！）
translatedstr:
(It did not break the record, but Mami's words
(Along with how to choose, the program was a hot topic!)

source:
しりとりを続けるコツは覚えることだ。
他の人が言った単語を、しっかりと記憶していこう
translatedstr:
The trick to keeping up with Shiritori is to remember.
Let's make sure we memorize the words that others have said.

source:
えっ！　もう真美の番！？　キオクキオク……。
うあうあ～！　真美、覚えるのニガテなのに～！
translatedstr:
What! It's already Mami's turn! Kioku kioku .......
Mami, I'm not good at remembering!

source:
（真美の記憶の限界は意外と早くおとずれ、
あっさりとチャレンジ終了となってしまった……）
translatedstr:
(The limits of Mami's memory came surprisingly quickly,
(The challenge was easily ended: ......)

source:
今からじゃ何をやっても遅いだろう。
後は……真美の勢いで乗り切るしかない！
translatedstr:
It will be too late to do anything about it now.
The rest will just have to ride out the momentum of ...... Mami!

source:
うあうあ！　もう真美の番！？
次は『に』？　えとえと……『兄ちゃ～ん！』
translatedstr:
Uhhhhhh! It's already Mami's turn!
Next time, "ni"? Uh, uh, ...... "Brother~!"

source:
（落ち着く間もなく本番に出てしまった真美は、
見せ場も作れずにチャレンジ終了となった……）
translatedstr:
(Mami went on the air before she had time to calm down,
The challenge ended without a showpiece (......).

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)

source: （今日は真美の握手会イベントだが…‥）
translatedstr: (Today is Mami's handshake event...‥)

source:
兄ちゃん、今日は握手会だよね！？
ファンの人、いーっぱい来てくれてるかなー♪
translatedstr:
Brother, you're shaking hands today!
I wonder if there are a lot of fans here...

source:
そうだな、前評判は良かったから
結構人が集まっていると思うぞ
translatedstr:
Yes, because it was so well received up front.
I think we've got a pretty good crowd.

source:
そっか！　よーし！
真美、全力でガンバんないといけないね！
translatedstr:
I see! All right!
Mami, we have to do our best to keep up the good work!

source:
ああ！　ついでにこの握手会の対応で、
更にファンの心をつかんで離さないようにしよう！
translatedstr:
Oh! And by the way, in response to this handshake,
Let's grab the hearts of our fans even more and never let them go!

source:
んっふっふ～♪　ハートをがっつりホカクだね。
お任せあれだよ、兄ちゃん！
translatedstr: Leave it to me, brother!

source:
わあ～！　兄ちゃん、見て見て！
真美のファンがあんなに！
translatedstr:
Wow! Brother, look at it, look at it!
Mami's fans like that!

source:
こんなに集まってくれたファンのみんなのために、
真美、なにかできないかな！？
translatedstr:
For all the fans who gathered here so much,
Mami, can't you do something!

source:
みんな真美に会いに来てくれたんだし、
今日だけのトクベツな握手とかないっ！？
translatedstr:
Everyone came to see Mami,
No special handshake just for today?

source:
特別な握手か。
そうだな……
translatedstr: A special handshake?

source: 優しく握る
translatedstr: hold a thing gently

source: 強く握る
translatedstr: grasp tightly

source: 普通に握る
translatedstr: grip normally

source: 弱く握る
translatedstr: grip weakly

source:
今、真美がファンのみんなに感謝しているなら……。
その気持ちを込めて、優しく握ってあげればどうだ？
translatedstr:
If Mami is grateful to all her fans now, she can thank them at .......
Why don't you give her a gentle squeeze with that feeling?

source:
そっか！　真美の気持ちでファンの手を、
やさしーくビブラートで包みこむ感じだね☆
translatedstr:
I see! A fan's hand with Mami's feeling,
It's like a gentle vibrato wrapping.

source:
それを言うならオブラートだろ。
でも、そのつもりで握手してみよう
translatedstr:
That's an obituary for it.
But let's shake hands with the intention of doing just that.

source:
今日は来てくれてありがと！
真美ガンバるから、応援ヨロシクねん♪
translatedstr:
Thanks for coming today!
Mami, I'll do my best, so please support me.

source:
ま、真美ちゃん、優しい！
……ありがとう！
translatedstr:
Well, Mami, you are so kind!
Thanks ......!

source:
（優しく包み込む真美の握手は大好評で、
ファンたちの心をガッチリと掴んだようだ！）
translatedstr:
(Mami's handshake, which gently enveloped me, was very popular,
(It seems to have captured the hearts and minds of the fans!)

source:
真美の感謝の気持ちを、力いっぱい伝えよう。
いつも以上に、強く元気に握手だ！
translatedstr:
Let's express Mami's gratitude with all our might.
It's a strong, energetic handshake, more so than usual!

source:
ラジャー！　真美の気持ちをこの手にこめて、
ファンのみんなに伝えてくるよ～ん！
translatedstr:
Rajah! Put Mami's feelings into this hand,
I'm going to go tell all my fans~!

source:
今日は来てくれてサンキューベリマッチョ！
これからも応援バッチリヨロだよ☆
translatedstr:
Thank you Berimacho for coming today!
Keep up the good work!

source:
（真美の元気がファンにも伝わり、
熱気と熱い声援に包まれた握手会になった！）
translatedstr:
(Mami's energy was felt by her fans,
(The handshake session was filled with enthusiasm and passionate cheering!)

source:
嬉しいのは分かるけど、はしゃぎ過ぎてもな。
ここは、いつもと変わらずにいこう
translatedstr:
I know you're happy, but don't get too excited.
Let's just go with what we always do here.

source: 今日は来てくれてサンキューベリマッチョ♪
translatedstr: Thank you for coming in today, Bellimacho... ♪

source:
（握手会は普段と変わらず進行したが、
特別に盛り上がることもなく終わってしまった……）
translatedstr:
(Although the handshake session proceeded as usual,
(It ended without any special excitement: ......)

source:
たまには弱く握ってみるのはどうだ？
いつも強く握手しすぎて、後半疲れちゃってるだろ
translatedstr:
How about a weak grip once in a while?
You always shake hands too hard, and you're getting tired in the second half.

source: 今日はサンキューね～……☆
translatedstr: Thanks for today. ......*

source:
（いつもと違う弱々しい真美の握手は、
逆にファンに不安を与えてしまった……）
translatedstr:
(The unusual and weak Mami's handshake,
(On the contrary, it has caused anxiety among fans. ......)

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)

source:
（真美のバラエティ番組の仕事で、いろんなエリアが
集まった、テーマパークに行くことになった）
translatedstr:
(Mami's variety show work, various areas are
(We got together, we're going to a theme park)

source:
うわ～、アニマルテーマパークだよ！　兄ちゃん！
収録でパークに来れるなんてラッキーですな～
translatedstr:
Wow, it's an animal theme park, brother!
You're lucky to be here in the Park for the recording!

source:
そんで、兄ちゃん！
真美は、どの動物をナカマにすればいいのかな！？
translatedstr:
So, brother!
I wonder which animal Mami should be Nakama!

source:
今日は水族館エリアで収録だな。
真美と動物たちとの『ふれあいチャレンジ』だよ
translatedstr:
It's recorded in the aquarium area today.
It's a "petting challenge" between Mami and the animals.

source:
パーク内には危険な動物もいるんだから、
あんまりはしゃぎ過ぎないように注意するんだぞ
translatedstr:
There are some dangerous animals in the park,
Be careful not to get too excited.

source:
兄ちゃんはカホゴで心配症ですな～。
この、アニマル博士、マミに任せておきたまえ！
translatedstr:
My brother is a cahogo and a worrier!
Leave it to this Dr. Animal, Mami!

source:
真美ちゃんは、どんなチャレンジがしたい？
希望があるなら、それで撮影を進めますよ
translatedstr:
What kind of challenge do you want to take on, Mami?
If you wish, we can go ahead and shoot with that.

source:
う～ん、難易度ハードモードなら、
『ワニのエサやり』とか『ペンギンとダンス対決』？
translatedstr:
Hmmm, if it's a hard difficulty mode,
Feeding the crocodile" or "Dancing with the penguins"?

source:
らくしょーイージーモードなら、
『タイムアタック』や『アシカとコラボショー』かな
translatedstr:
If it's a rakusho easy mode,
Maybe "Time Attack" or "Collaboration Show with Sea Lions".

source:
どれもチャレンジしがいがありそうっしょ！？
兄ちゃんなら、どれがいいと思う？
translatedstr:
They all sound like a challenge!
Which one do you think my brother would like?

source:
いろんなアイディアが出てきたな。
そうだな、ここは……
translatedstr:
You've got all kinds of ideas.
Yes, this is ......

source: ペンギン
translatedstr: Penguin

source: アシカ
translatedstr: sea lion

source: ワニ
translatedstr: crocodile

source: タイムアタック
translatedstr: time attack

source:
ペンギンは子どもたちにも人気だし、
やっぱり『ペンギンとダンス対決』かな
translatedstr:
And penguins are popular with children,
I still think "Dancing with the Penguins" is the way to go.

source:
んっふっふ～♪　オモシロそーだよね！　ペンギンと
ダンス対決、アイドルとして負けられませんな～！
translatedstr:
Penguins and
Dance duel, as an idol, I can't lose!

source:
このダンスマスター・マミに勝てるかな～！？
ほら、みんな一緒に！　それ♪　ガーガーガー♪
translatedstr:
I wonder if I can beat this Dance Master Mami!
Come on, everybody together! That one... ♪ Gah-gah-gah ♪

source: ガーガーガー♪　ガーガーガー♪
translatedstr: ♪ Gah-gah-gah ♪ ♪ Gah-gah-gah ♪

source:
（まるで練習したかのようなペンギンと息の合った
ダンスに、スタッフも観客たちも大盛りあがりだ！）
translatedstr:
(Penguin and breathtaking as if they had practiced together)
The staff and the audience were excited to see the dance!)

source:
（ディレクターも大満足で、
また番組に真美を起用したいと言ってくれた！）
translatedstr:
(The director was also very satisfied,
(And they want Mami on the show again!)

source:
パフォーマンス性の高さなら、やっぱりアシカだろ。
ここは『アシカとコラボショー』で決まりだな
translatedstr:
If it's performance quality, it's the sea lion.
I think we'll have to settle for "Sea lion and collaboration show" here.

source:
ビーチボールでキャッチボール☆　だね！
真美のマキュウを見せる時がきてしまいましたな！
translatedstr:
Catching a ball with a beach ball!
It's time to show Mami's makyu!

source:
ナイスだよアシカくん！　はい、エサを……。
真美の手まで食べちゃダメだよ～！　うあうあ！
translatedstr:
Nice one, Sea Lion-san! Yes, you can feed them at .......
Don't even eat Mami's hands~!

source:
（真美が尻もちをつくトラブルはあったものの、
それも込みで、収録は十分に盛り上がった！）
translatedstr:
(Although there was some trouble with Mami falling on her buttocks,
(That and the recording was exciting enough!)

source:
迫力で言えばワニが一番かな。
ここは『ワニのエサやり』に挑戦してみようか
translatedstr:
In terms of power, the crocodile is probably the most powerful.
Let's try "feeding the crocodile" here.

source:
うわっ！　ワニがいっぱい集まってきちゃった！？
兄ちゃん、どうしよ～！
translatedstr:
Oh, my gosh, so many crocodiles have gathered!
Brother, what should I do~?

source:
（真美は無事だったものの、エサの取り合いで
ワニが興奮してしまい、収録は中止となった……）
translatedstr:
(Mami was safe, but they were fighting over the bait.
(The alligator got so excited that the recording was cancelled: ......)

source:
『タイムアタック』かな。これなら収録に
時間もかからないだろうし、いいんじゃないか？
translatedstr:
I think "Time Attack" would be a good choice for the recording.
It wouldn't take long, would it?

source:
トップは真美選手！　最終コーナーに……えっ？
……えええっ！？　ここって走っちゃダメなの！？
translatedstr:
Mami is in the lead! She is in the last corner at ...... what?
...... Eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee! You can't run here!

source:
（俺たちは水族館のスタッフから厳重に注意を受け、
結果、収録分はお蔵入りとなってしまった……）
translatedstr:
(We received a stern warning from the aquarium staff,
(As a result, the recording was put on hold. ......)

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)

source:
次のミニライブの流れは、こんな感じか。
真美はどう思う？
translatedstr:
So this is how the next mini live show will go.
What do you think Mami?

source:
うーん……ねぇねぇ、兄ちゃん。真美の
ＭＣタイム、もうちょっとだけ増やせないかな？
translatedstr:
Hmmm... ...... Hey, hey brother... Mami's...
MC time, can we add a little more?

source:
話したいことがいーっぱいあって、
いっつも時間が足りなくなっちゃうんだよー！
translatedstr:
I had so many things to talk about,
I always run out of time!

source:
ああ、真美のＭＣはファンの間でも好評だしな。
しかし、時間か……。それなら……
translatedstr:
Yeah, Mami's MC is a fan favorite.
But it's either time or ....... If that's the case, you can go to ......

source: 質より量
translatedstr: quantity before quality

source: 量と質
translatedstr: quantity and quality

source: 量より質
translatedstr: quality before quantity

source:
質より量でいくか。時間内に全部話すんだ。
大変だけど、言葉につまらず話せばいけそうだ
translatedstr:
Quantity is better than quality; you have to tell the whole story in time.
It's tough, but I think I can do it if I don't get bogged down in words.

source:
さっすが、兄ちゃん♪　んじゃ、ＭＣマミによる
マシンガントークチャレンジ、開幕ＤＡ・ＺＥ！
translatedstr:
Well done, my brother... by MC Mami.
Machine Gun Talk Challenge, Opening DA-ZE!

source:
量と質だな。話したいことごとに時間配分を
考えてみるとか。ようは、バランスの問題だ
translatedstr:
It's quantity and quality... time allocated for each thing you want to talk about.
It's all a matter of balance.

source:
バランスとか配分とか真美、ニガテだよ～！
あっ、でも兄ちゃんが一緒に考えてくれるよね！？
translatedstr:
I'm not good at balance and distribution, Mami!
Oh, but my brother will figure it out with me!

source:
量よりも質だな。真美が一番話したいことだけ話す、
とかどうだ？　全部話してたら時間が足りないだろ？
translatedstr:
It's quality over quantity; Mami only talks about what she wants to talk about the most,
How about, if I told you everything, we wouldn't have enough time, would we?

source:
えぇ～？　話したいのに話しちゃダメって、
そんなの面白くないじゃん？
translatedstr:
I want to talk, but I'm not allowed to,
That's no fun, right?

source:
まあ、上演時間が決まっている以上、その時間の中で
真美のいいところをアピールしていこう
translatedstr:
Well, as long as the performance time is fixed.
Let's show off Mami's good points.

source:
うん……そうだねー。分かった！
時間の中で時間いっぱい、ガンバるぴょーん☆
translatedstr:
Yeah ...... yeah, I get it!
We'll do our best to make the most of the time we have.

source:
その意気だぞ、真美。
俺もなにか演出を考えておくから一緒に頑張ろうな
translatedstr:
That's the spirit, Mami.
I'll think of something to direct, and we'll work together.

source:
（真美との仕事帰り、律子と音無さんに頼まれた
資料を探しに、図書館に来た）
translatedstr:
(On my way home from work with Mami, Ritsuko and Otonashi asked me to do this.
(I came to the library to look for materials.)

source:
律子に頼まれた資料はこれで、次は音無さんの……
ん？　真美、そわそわしてどうした？
translatedstr:
This is the document that Ritsuko asked for, and the next one is by Otonashi: ......
Hm? Mami, what's wrong with your fidgeting?

source:
兄ちゃ～ん、図書館って静かにしなきゃだし、
真美、超ヒマすぎてヒマラヤ星人だよ～……
translatedstr:
Brother~, you have to be quiet in a library,
Mami, I'm too super busy to be a Himalayan star - ......

source:
おっと、手伝わせてすまないな……。
そうだな、待っている時間が暇なら……
translatedstr:
Oops, sorry to help. ......
Yes, if you're not busy waiting, you can go to ......

source: 漫画を読む
translatedstr: Read the manga

source: 雑誌を読む
translatedstr: Read magazine

source: 新聞を読む
translatedstr: read a newspaper

source:
ここの図書館は、漫画もあったはずだ。
確かあっちの棚だぞ、読んでくるか？
translatedstr:
The library here must have had comic books.
I'm pretty sure it's on that shelf over there. You want to go read it?

source:
え、マンガあるんだ！？　やったー♪
兄ちゃん、真美、マンガ読んでくるー！
translatedstr:
Oh, you have manga! Yay!
Brother, Mami, I'm going to read a comic book!

source:
雑誌でも読んでるか？　アイドル誌や、
ファッション誌も置いてあるぞ
translatedstr:
Do you read magazines? Idol magazines,
They have fashion magazines, too.

source:
ニャールホド☆　雑誌まであるなんて、
図書館ってイロイロ置いてあんだねー
translatedstr:
Nyarhod* I can't believe they even have magazines,
Libraries have so many things!

source:
たまには新聞でも読んでみるか？
世の中の動きを知っておくのは、重要だぞ
translatedstr:
You want to read a newspaper once in a while?
It's important to know what's going on in the world.

source:
ぶ～……律っちゃんならヨロコビそーだけどさ、
もうちょっと真美向けなのをオススメしてよー
translatedstr:
B~...... Ritsuchan would be so joyful,
Recommend something a little more Mami oriented!

source:
あと、この奥に学習書とかが置いてあるな。
ここなら色々と揃ってるし、勉強にもなるぞ？
translatedstr:
Also, there's some study books and stuff in the back here.
We've got a lot of stuff here, and you're going to learn a lot, okay?

source:
勉強……はっ！？　今日、宿題が出てたんだ！
真美、こんなヒマラヤンしてる場合じゃなかった……
translatedstr:
Study ...... Ha! I had homework today!
Mami, I shouldn't have been such a Himalayan: ......

source:
じゃあ学習机で宿題して待ってるか？
俺も用事を終えたら、宿題を手伝ってやるから
translatedstr:
So you'll just sit at your study table and do your homework and wait for me?
I'll help you with your homework when I'm done with mine.

source:
え、ホント！？　じゃあ宿題やって待ってるね！
いやぁ、思わぬラッキーですなぁ♪
translatedstr:
I'll do my homework and wait for you!
Well, I'm unexpectedly lucky...

source:
兄ちゃん！　今日もお仕事、闇に飲まれよ！
天上の、えーっと、シュク、シュクホウ？　だっけ？
translatedstr:
Brother! Work today, and drink in the darkness!
Heavenly, uh, shuk, shuk ho? Was it?

source:
ん、なんだ真美、もしかして……蘭子の真似か？
ずいぶんと気に入ったみたいだな
translatedstr:
Hmm, what's that Mami, maybe you're imitating ...... Ranko?
You seem to like it a lot.

source:
うん！　ランランって真美のトモダチには
いなかったタイプだかんね
translatedstr:
Ranran is a friend of Mami's.
She's the type of girl who wasn't around.

source:
いやぁ～、
カワイイうえにカッコイイとか反則ですなぁ！
translatedstr:
Oh no,
It's not only cute, but also cool, which is a foul!

source:
そうだな。
なんと言っても蘭子の格好いいところは……
translatedstr: After all, the coolest thing about Ranko is ......

source: 喋り方
translatedstr: speaking style

source: ポーズ
translatedstr: pose

source: 熊本出身
translatedstr: Born in Kumamoto

source:
喋り方だな。あの独特な言い回しは真似したくなる。
理解するのに少し時間はかかるが……
translatedstr:
It's the way she speaks, that unique way of saying things that I want to imitate.
It takes a little time to understand, but ......

source:
兄ちゃん、分かってるね～。でも、ランラン語は
『考えるな、感じろ！ 』ってやつだよ☆
translatedstr:
You know what I'm talking about, brother!
Don't think, feel!

source:
あのポーズだな！
大きな動きだけど、蘭子らしい品があるしな
translatedstr:
That pose!
It's a big move, but it's a classy one, just like Ranko.

source:
ランランのポーズ、カッコイイんだよね～！
真美もついマネしちゃうんだ
translatedstr:
I think it's a cool pose for a run-run!
Mami does the same thing.

source:
熊本出身ってところだな！
なんたって『火の国』っていうぐらいだし……
translatedstr:
I guess that's the part about being from Kumamoto!
After all, it's called "Land of Fire." ......

source:
えっ？　兄ちゃん、ランランはヒノクニじゃなくて、
『魔界よりいでしダテンシ』でしょ？
translatedstr:
What? Brother, Ranran is not Hinokuni,
It's "Datenshi from the Demon World," right?

source:
う～ん、もっとランランのこと知りたいなぁ♪
一緒にＲＰＧごっことかできたらオモシロそーだし☆
translatedstr:
Hmmm... I wish I knew more about Lanlan...
It would be fun to play RPGs together.

source:
それなら……蘭子を遊びに誘ってみたらどうだ？
ゲームの話とかなら、一緒に盛り上がれるだろ
translatedstr:
Then why don't you invite ...... Ranko to play with you?
If we're talking about games or something, we can have a good time together.

source:
それだ！　ゲームしながらカッコイイセリフって
サイコーかも！　亜美も誘って、遊んでくる！
translatedstr:
That's it! Cool lines while playing a game.
I'm going to invite Ami to come and play with us!

source:
（メンバー同士の仲が深まるのは良いことだ。
真美の行動力には感謝だな）
translatedstr:
(It's good to see members getting to know each other better.
(Kudos to Mami for her energy.)

source:
（新しい私服を探しているという真美に連れられ、
アパレルショップに来たが……）
translatedstr:
(Taken by Mami, who was looking for new personal clothes,
(I came to an apparel store but ......)

source:
なあ、真美。普段着を買うなら俺よりも、
亜美と一緒の方が良かったんじゃないのか？
translatedstr:
Hey, Mami, if you want to buy everyday clothes, than I am,
Wouldn't you have been better off with Ami?

source:
たまには兄ちゃんの意見も、聞きたいの！
ねぇ兄ちゃん、どんな服が真美に似合うかな？
translatedstr:
Sometimes I want to hear my brother's opinion!
Hey brother, what kind of clothes would look good on Mami?

source:
真美に似合う服か。
俺が選ぶとしたら……
translatedstr:
Clothes that look good on Mami?
If I had to choose, I'd go to ......

source:
ちょっと
大人っぽい服
translatedstr:
just a minute
adult-like clothing

source:
動きやすい
カジュアルな服
translatedstr:
easy to move around
Casual clothes

source:
子どもっぽい
色数の多い服
translatedstr:
infantile
Clothes with many colors

source:
たまには、ちょっと大人っぽい路線はどうだ？
意外性があってよさそうだけど……
translatedstr:
How about going a little more mature route once in a while?
Looks good and unexpected. ......

source:
んっふっふ～♪　ついに真美のせくしーモード解禁？
真美のせくしーさが爆発しちゃうぞー！　ドカーン！
translatedstr:
Mami's Seshi-Mode finally lifted?
Mami's sekushi-ness is about to explode... Boom!

source:
いつも元気いっぱいな真美には、動きやすくて
カジュアルな服が、一番似合うんじゃないか？
translatedstr:
For Mami, who is always full of energy, it is easy to move around.
Casual clothes look best on you, don't they?

source:
それって、いつも着てる服がヤッパリ一番って感じ？
動きやすいけど、イメチェンもしたいんだよね☆
translatedstr:
Does that mean that the clothes you always wear are always the best?
It's easy to move around, but I need a change of scenery.

source:
やっぱり年相応な服が似合うんじゃないかな？
このカラフルな服とか、子どもっぽくていいだろ
translatedstr:
I still think you look good in clothes that are appropriate for your age.
You know, these colorful clothes and all that childish stuff.

source:
も～……そうやって兄ちゃんは、いつも
オトメな真美を子ども扱いするんだから！
translatedstr:
Moo~...... that's how my brother always is.
They treat Mami like a child!

source:
う～ん、ステージ衣装とはまた違うから、
女の子の普段着は、選ぶのが難しいな……
translatedstr:
Hmmm, because it's different from stage costumes,
Girls' everyday clothes are so hard to choose from. ......

source:
兄ちゃんって、こーゆー時はユージュー不満だね。
まだまだシュギョー不足のようじゃのう
translatedstr:
My brother is not happy with Eugene at times like this.
It seems we are still short of shugyo.

source:
優柔不断ってことか？
実際、決められないし……オシャレは難しいな
translatedstr:
You mean indecisive?
In fact, I can't decide, and it's hard to ...... fashionable.

source:
しかたがないなー。亜美にも協力してもらって
シュギョーしなきゃ！　というわけでまた来ようね♪
translatedstr:
I have no choice but to ask Ami to help me.
I have to shugyo! So let's come back...

source:
ああ、俺も、次までに
もうちょっと勉強しておくよ
translatedstr:
Yeah, me too, by next time.
I'll study it some more.

source: （事務所で真美がゲームをしているが……）
translatedstr: (Mami is playing a game in her office, but ......)

source:
なんだ真美、ひとりでゲーム中か？
いつもみたいに亜美や杏たちを誘わないのか？
translatedstr:
What's up Mami, are you playing a game by yourself?
Why don't you invite Ami, Anzu and the others like you usually do?

source:
あんずっちとテンテンがチョー強くて、真美、
負けっぱなしだから、秘密の特訓中なんだよ～
translatedstr:
Anzuchi and Tenten are very strong, Mami,
I've been losing so much, I'm in secret training!

source:
兄ちゃ～ん！　真美、どうすれば勝てるかな～？
このままじゃ真美、オメイ炎上できないよー！
translatedstr:
Brother~! Mami, how can I win?
Mami, I can't omey fire at this rate!

source:
炎上したら大変だから、汚名返上のことか？
しかし、杏と甜花のふたりに勝つには……
translatedstr:
It's a big deal if it goes up in flames, so is it about returning the stigma?
However, in order to win against Anzu and Tenka...

source: ひたすら練習
translatedstr: Practicing earnestly

source: 相手を観察して対応
translatedstr: Observe and respond to others

source: 運に任せる
translatedstr: trust to luck

source:
やっぱり、ひたすら練習あるのみじゃないか？
秘密の特訓は、ナイスアイディアだと思うぞ！
translatedstr:
After all, there's only one thing to do: practice.
I think the secret training is a nice idea!

source:
に、兄ちゃんの目がファイヤーしてる！？
よーし！　真美、もっともっと秘密の特訓続けるよ！
translatedstr:
Ni, my brother's eyes are FIRE!
All right! Mami, I'll keep training more and more secret!

source:
ふたりがなにをしようとしているか、
相手をじっくり観察してみたらどうだ？
translatedstr:
What are they trying to do?
Why don't you take a long hard look at the person you're dealing with?

source:
か、観察日記は……真美のニガテな宿題だよ～！
でも兄ちゃんのアドバイス、参考にしてみるかぁ……
translatedstr:
Ka, the observation diary is ...... Mami's nitty-gritty homework!
But I'll take your advice, brother. ......

source:
いっそ運に任せてみるってのはどうだ？
『運も実力のうち』って言うしな
translatedstr:
How about we just leave it to chance?
As they say, "Luck is part of skill.

source:
えー、運任せじゃ真美も相手もつまんないっしょ？
もっとタガイのジツリョクで競い合わなくちゃ！
translatedstr:
Well, it's boring for both Mami and her partner if you leave it to chance, isn't it?
We need to compete with more Tagay's Jitsuryoku!

source:
しかし、いいライバルができてよかったな。
それにもしかするとふたりも、練習しているかもな
translatedstr:
But it's nice to have a good competitor.
And maybe they're both practicing, too.

source:
うん、真美もゲーム仲間が増えてうれしいよーん♪
あれもこれもそれも兄ちゃんのおかげだね！
translatedstr:
Yes, Mami is glad to have more friends in the game.
That, that, and that, all thanks to you, brother!

source:
そんなこと言って……
またコンビニ限定の新しいお菓子でもでたのか？
translatedstr:
Say that. ......
Is it another new candy only available at convenience stores?

source:
んっふっふ～、バレてしまいましたか！
限定チョコ、後で一緒に買いに行こうね、兄ちゃん♪
translatedstr:
Hmmm...I guess they found out!
Limited edition chocolate, let's go buy some together later, brother♪

source:
真美、そろそろ休憩時間はおしまいだぞ。
もう充分、ゲームやっただろ？
translatedstr:
Mami, it's time for your break to end.
Haven't you played enough games already?

source:
見て、兄ちゃん！　クレーンゲームがあるよ！
帰る前に真美のために、なんか取っておくれ～ん♪
translatedstr:
Look, brother! There's a crane game!
Please get something for Mami before you leave.

source:
仕方がないな。これをやったら帰るからな。
ええと、なににするかな……
translatedstr:
I don't have a choice; I'll leave after I do this.
Let's see, what should it be: ......

source: お菓子
translatedstr: sweets

source: クッション
translatedstr: cushion

source: カップ麺
translatedstr: cup noodle

source: 真美！　お菓子の詰め合わせを狙うぞ
translatedstr: Mami! We're going for the assortment of sweets!

source:
兄ちゃん、ナイスターゲット！　事務所のモミアゲに
なるね！　あ、でも最初は真美にお菓子選ばせてね♪
translatedstr:
Brother, nice target! To the momiage in the office.
Oh, but first let Mami choose the sweets.

source: （よし！　すごく喜んでくれているな……！）
translatedstr: (Okay! You're making me very happy. ......!)

source: あの可愛いクッションはどうだ？
translatedstr: How about that pretty cushion?

source:
いいね～！　事務所のソファーに合いそうだし、
お昼寝用の枕にもなりそう～
translatedstr:
I like it! It looks like it would go well with the sofa in my office,
It would also make a great nap pillow~!

source: （ふう、どうやら喜んでくれたみたいだ）
translatedstr: (Phew, apparently she's pleased.)

source: カップ麺はどうだ？
translatedstr: How about a cup of noodles?

source:
兄ちゃん、それ真美のためじゃなくて、
自分のために取ろうとしてるっしょ！　ぶーぶー！
translatedstr:
Brother, that's not for Mami,
You're trying to get it for yourself!

source: （うーん、あまり喜んでくれなかったみたいだ……）
translatedstr: (Hmmm, I don't think she was too happy about it. ......)

source:
（ルミナスの中でどうやらモノマネが
流行っているらしい……）
translatedstr:
(The moniker apparently in the luminous
(I hear it's going viral: ......)

source:
兄ちゃん！　真美の新しい決めポーズ見てちょ！
誰のマネか兄ちゃんに見破れますかなぁ？
translatedstr:
Look at Mami's new pose!
I wonder if my brother will be able to spot whose impersonation it is?

source:
ルミナスメンバーのモノマネか？
どれ、見せてくれ
translatedstr:
Is this an impersonation of a luminous member?
Which one, let me see.

source: いっくよ～ん！
translatedstr: I'll be right back!

source: なるほど。そのポーズは……
translatedstr: I see...that pose is ......

source: 咲耶
translatedstr: Sakuya

source: きらり
translatedstr: Kirari

source: 静香
translatedstr: Shizuka

source:
咲耶の真似だろう？
どうだ？
translatedstr:
You're copying Sakuya, aren't you?
What do you think?

source:
アタリだぴょーん♪　かっくいい王子ポーズどう？
真美の新たなミリキ、引き出せちゃったかなー♪
translatedstr:
How about a nice Prince Charming pose?
I wonder if I've brought out the new Miriki in Mami...

source:
（なるほど格好いいか……。
普段とは違った真美の魅力が出てるな）
translatedstr:
(Is it cool enough for you? .......
(You're showing a different Mami's charm than usual.)

source: もしかしてきらりの真似か？
translatedstr: Could it be an imitation of Kirari?

source:
兄ちゃんは見る目がないなぁ。
きらりんは、もっと『うっきゃー☆』っしょ？
translatedstr:
My brother is so blind to see.
Kirarin is more "Ukkyo☆", right?

source: （間違えたみたいだ……誰の真似だったんだろう）
translatedstr: (I think I made a mistake ...... who was I imitating)

source: もしかして静香の真似か？
translatedstr: Perhaps you are imitating Shizuka?

source:
あれ？　これが伝わらないなんて、
兄ちゃんって案外見る目、ないのかな？
translatedstr:
Huh? I can't believe I didn't get this,
I wonder if my brother is more discerning than I thought.

source: （間違えた上に、俺の力量を疑われてしまった……）
translatedstr: (I made a mistake and they questioned my competence ......)

source:
（ルミナスのメンバーの中で、モノマネが流行って
いるらしく、真美がモノマネを披露しにきた）
translatedstr:
(The moniker became popular among the members of Luminous.
(Mami came to perform a mimicry).

source:
じゃ、兄ちゃん、いっくよー！
真美のモノマネ聞いて～誰か当ててちょんまげ！
translatedstr:
Okay, brother, I'm going!
Listen to Mami's moniker - guess who's a chonmage!

source:
『ハーッハッハッハッ！　我が友よ！　我に供物を！
魔力滴る、天界の甘露を捧げよ！』
translatedstr:
'Ha-ha-ha! My friends, give me an offering!
Dripping with magic, offer up the nectar of the heavens!

source:
（兄ちゃん！　お菓子食べたい！
元気が出そうな甘いやつちょーだい！）
translatedstr:
（I want to eat sweets!
(Give me something sweet to cheer me up!)

source: う～ん、そのモノマネは……
translatedstr: Hmmm, that moniker is ......

source: 蘭子
translatedstr: Ranko

source: 凛世
translatedstr: Rinze

source: 歌織さん
translatedstr: voice with a poetic haiku flavor (flavour)

source:
蘭子のモノマネか？
しかし、よくそんな難しい言葉を……
translatedstr:
Is this an impersonation of Ranko?
But how often do you use such difficult words ......

source:
んっふっふ～♪　ゾンブンにおどろきたまえ～♪
真美は新たな世界への扉を開けたのだー！
translatedstr:
Be amazed at the zombun~♪
Mami has opened the door to a new world!

source:
（正解だったか、当てられてよかった。
しかし真美のモノマネ、なかなか上手だったな）
translatedstr:
(I'm glad you guessed right.
(But Mami's mimicry was quite good.)

source: もしかして凛世の真似か？
translatedstr: Could it be an imitation of Rinze?

source:
兄ちゃん、ちゃんと聞いてた？　りんぴょんは
もっとこう、オシトヤカでカレンって感じっしょ？
translatedstr:
Did you hear me right, brother? Rinpyo is...
It's more like "ositoyaka" and "karen," right?

source:
（間違えたみたいだ……。
誰のモノマネだったんだろう）
translatedstr:
(I think I made a mistake. .......
(I wonder whose impersonation that was.)

source: もしかして歌織さんの真似か？
translatedstr: Perhaps you are imitating Kaori-san?

source:
う～ん……真美のレッスン不足？
それとも兄ちゃんの耳がドンカンなだけ？
translatedstr:
Hmmm... ...... Mami's lack of lessons?
Or is it just that my brother's ears are donkey ears?

source:
（違ったみたいだ……。
しかし誰のモノマネだったんだろう？）
translatedstr:
(I guess not. .......
(But whose impersonation was it?)

source:
（真美の仕事終わり、
気分転換を兼ねて出かけることにした……）
translatedstr:
(Mami's end of work,
I decided to go out for a change (......)

source:
（もうこんな時間か……。
真美も楽しんでくれたようだな）
translatedstr:
(Is it that time already? .......
(Mami seems to have enjoyed it as well.)

source:
兄ちゃん！　真美、すっごく楽しかったよ～♪
また一緒に遊ぼうね
translatedstr:
Mami, it was so much fun!
Let's play together again.

source:
んっふっふ～。　兄ちゃんさっすがー！
真美的兄ちゃんポイントがぐんぐん上がったよ～♪
translatedstr:
Mmmmmmmm~, brother, that's great!
Mami-esque big brother points went up a lot~!
